thread.section_title: LD Mountain Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LD Mountain Centre | www.ldmountaincentre.com | 5 of 113
thread.title: RA
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by RA

author: RA
title: RA
text: Bought a couple of pairs of Bridgedale liner socks. Price, even including the delivery charge, was better than on the High Street. Clicked to buy at about 3pm and they were delivered by my local postman at about 11am the next day. Way quicker than I expected. Will definitely be using LD Mountain Centre again.
